description: The Lily of the Nile, or Agapanthus 'Cold Hardy White' is a stunning plant with lush foliage and white flower heads that look like stars glowing on a summer night. Its dark green leaves make a great backdrop to the clusters of beautiful white flowers. It can handle cold weather better than other lilies, which makes it an excellent choice for cooler climates. It's a great accent plant for any garden, requiring very little maintenance; no need to deadhead or prune. The Lily of the Nile is an easy-to-care for, hardy plant with beautiful white blooms that can be enjoyed all summer long.
